#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int a, b, carry, sum, r1, r2, count;
	scanf("%d %d", &a, &b );


	while( a || b ) {

		carry = 0;
		count = 0;
		
		while( ( a > 0 ) && ( b > 0 ) ) {

			r1 = a % 10;
			r2 = b % 10;
			sum = carry + r1 + r2;
			carry = sum / 10;
			if( carry )
				count++;
			a /= 10;
			b /= 10; 
		}

		while( a > 0 ) {

			r1 = a % 10;
			sum = carry + r1;
			carry = sum / 10;
			if( carry )
				count++;
			a /= 10;
		}

		while( b > 0 ) {

			r2 = b % 10;
			sum = carry + r2;
			carry = sum / 10;
			if( carry )
				count++;
			b /= 10;
		}

		if( count == 1 )
			printf("1 carry operation.\n");
		else if( count == 0 )
			printf("No carry operation.\n");
		else
			printf("%d carry operations.\n", count);

		scanf("%d %d", &a, &b );
	}

	return 0;
}
